the cloud, with the worldwide launch of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online platform-the company's hope for blunting similar competition from Oracle and Salesforce.com. A Jan. 17 statement by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer emphasized the cloud platform's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data. The release comes at a time when Salesforce.com and Oracle have been making very public their own product-line updates and swipes at Microsoft's market position.
